venue.name: Stonehurst the Robert Treat Paine Estate

item.description:
Approximately 9.5 minute mile pace.

Meet at parking lot at Stonehurst/Paine Estate.

FINALLY!  I haven't been able to do one of these Sunday runs in forever.

This will be a little different from previous Greenway runs because we will stay within Stonehurst and explore the various trails, including portions of the Western Greenway.  I'm just not up to a full 9 mile loop yet.  I don't even have a course planned; we'll just enjoy the trails and scenery, then head back to the parking lot after about 40 minutes.  The Paine Estate is just under 100 acres so we'll never be too far from the lot.

Trail map:

http://www.stonehurstwaltham.org/_pdf/scl_trail_map.pdf
item.name: Western Greenway Run 4-5 miles
